titles.title: We Are Colors From The Inside Out

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
We are colors from the inside out.
It's God's nature within us and it's working its way out.
We are colors from the inside out.
It's God's nature working its way out.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
In the beginning, God said, Let there be light.
And in that light He made many colors.
Each one was separate and called by name,
Given a nature in Him, the same.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
God, He saw that it was good.
Satan, He never understood.
And those under his spell, they don't see so well.
They don't see those colors as they should.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Green can be envy or God's new life.
Blue can be self-pity or His authority.
Yellow is a coward or God's nature perfect and true.
Red is anger or His blood cleansing you.
